```
## Error in library("emo"): there is no package called 'emo'
```
<br/>
<br/>

Scientific reproducibility is key for the advancement of Science.
In this first episode, we will check that we have the same package versions that we used throughout the tutorial.

This will also show how you can make sure that you are being consisten tin your package usage to reproduce your own results in teh future.




```r
packageVersion("rotl")
```

```
## [1] '3.0.11'
```
